remarks: Value of the projective map of a Hilbert lattice.  Definition in Theorem 15.5 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 62.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Oct-2011.)
statement:
pmapfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
pmapfval.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
pmapfval.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
pmapfval.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
pmapval $p |- ( ( K e. C /\ X e. B ) -> ( M ` X ) = { a e. A | a .<_ X } ) $.
$d A a $.
$d K a $.
$d X a $.
